fields.name: Sony A7III
fields.description: The Sony A7 III features a 24.2MP Exmor R ™ CMOS sensor and BIONZ X ™ image processor, combining twice as fast data read speeds and 1.8 times data processing capability. The camera has 693 phase detection AF points covering nearly 93% of the image area, plus 425 tight AF contrast detection points for improved focus. The Sony α7 III can shoot in one continuous burst with up to 10 fps AF / AE tracking and up to 8 fps continuous live-view shooting. In addition to speed and AF, the enhanced processing capabilities allow images to be obtained with clarity and reduced noise across the entire sensitivity range of ISO 100-51200 ( 50-204800 ). Video recording capabilities are also enhanced for better UHD 4K video recording, and thanks to the 5-axis SteadyShot INSIDE stabilization that the Sony A7 III has, you get high-performance jitter correction with up to 5 stops.

fields.name: Nikon Z5
fields.description:
The Nikon Z5 is a compact and multifunctional mirrorless full-frame camera with interchangeable optics, equipped with a 24.3MP sensor, with IS0 from 100 to 51,200 and a 5-axis vibration reduction system, which also offers 4K video recording at 30 fps.

The body of the model is made of light magnesium alloy and is protected from weathering, dust and moisture. The electronic viewfinder of the Nikon Z5 has a high resolution of 3,690,000 dots and visualizes in real time the changes in basic settings such as exposure parameters, ISO and others.

Focusing is based on a 273-point hybrid autofocus system that offers eye and animal detection, which also works in video mode.

The model has two SD UHS-II memory card slots.

fields.name: Canon EOS R8
fields.description:
The Canon EOS R8 is a lightweight and compact full-frame camera with a 24.2MP sensor and DIGIC X processor. The camera records UHD 4K 60p video with 6K overstorage, offers 4:2:2 10-bit recording, 4K 30p continuous recording for up to 2 hours as well as FullHD 180p video.

HDR PQ 10-bit and Canon Log 3 10-bit, UVC/UAC for use as a webcam and Full HD live stream without additional software to Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Skype, etc. are available to videographers.

Handheld video is stabilized by the Movie Digital IS system, which can combine its action with the optical stabilization of compatible RF lenses.

When shooting video, visual markers indicate the different aspect ratios for different social media so that the shooter can frame as accurately as possible.

The Canon EOS R8 relies on Dual Pixel CMOS AF II with 1053 automatic phase detection AF points across the entire sensor area. The autofocus system provides improved object detection and tracking and recognizes people, animals and vehicles.

For remote control, streaming and file transfer, USB-C, micro-HDMI, external microphone input, headphone jack, remote control port, Bluetooth and Wi-Fi are available. The Bluetooth connection allows the transmission of GPS data from a smartphone to the camera for geotagging.

fields.name: Canon EOS 2000D
fields.description:
Enjoy easy storytelling with a DSLR camera Easily capture detailed DSLR quality and Full HD movie views in low light with the 24.1MP EOS 2000D. Share instantly and remotely with Wi-Fi, NFC and the Canon Camera Connect app.

Great movie quality movie pictures
Switch to a 24.1 megapixel sensor that has up to 19 times the size of most smartphones to capture stories with beautifully defocused backgrounds even in complex light conditions.

Creativity effortlessly
Enjoy shooting with the Creative Instant mode display and add unique strokes with creative filters. Just aim and shoot for great results with Smart Scene Auto.

Shoot with confidence
Capture the moment, just as you remember it, with precision autofocus, a 3.0 fps photo series and a DIGIC 4+ processor. Enjoy easy framing with the optical viewfinder and see the results on a 7.5cm LCD.

Easy sharing, remote shooting
Instantly transfer your stories to a smart device for easy sharing on social networks or cloud archiving in irista, and shoot remotely with Wi-Fi, NFC and the Canon Camera Connect app.

Discover the Power of DSLR
Enjoy easy DSLR photography instructions with Canon's Photo Companion app (you can download it for Android and iOS). ADDED lenses and accessories or take full manual control over shooting when you're done.

fields.name: Nikon Z50
fields.description:
The Nikon Z 50 is a DX-format mirrorless camera, suitable for both still image and video capture.

The Z50 features a 20.9 megapixel CMOS sensor and EXPEED 6 processor, which allows for up to 11 frames per second burst, a 209-point hybrid autofocus system with eye recognition and sensitivity up to ISO 51200.

For videographers, the camera offers UHD 4K 30p and Full HD 120p video with editable video.

The body design is ergonomic and offers a high resolution OLED EVF of 2.36 million pixels, a 3.2-inch 180 ° swivel touchscreen, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, and Nikon SnapBridge allows wireless transfer of photos and videos, and remote control of the Nikon Z50 from a mobile device.

The Z50 features a 20.9-megapixel CMOS sensor and an EXPEED 6 processor that enables continuous shooting at up to 11 frames per second, a 209-point hybrid autofocus system with eye detection and light sensitivity up to ISO 51200.

For videographers, the camera offers UHD 4K 30p and Full HD 120p video with the ability to edit the clips and save them in the camera's memory or record them to an additional external recorder via HDMI output.

The body design is ergonomic and offers a high-resolution OLED EVF of 2.36 million dots, a 3.2-inch touchscreen with 180° rotation, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, and through the Nikon SnapBridge app, wireless transfer of photos and videos is possible and Nikon Z50 remote control from a mobile device.

A single SD memory card slot supports up to UHS-I protocol for fast storage of photos and video files.

The robust magnesium alloy body is both dust and weather resistant, which is extremely beneficial when working in harsh climates and adverse conditions.

The included EN-EL25 Li-ion battery provides approximately 300 shots on a single charge, and in-camera charging is supported when using the optional EH-73P power adapter.

fields.name: Hasselblad X2D II 100C
fields.description: The Hasselblad X2D 100C medium format camera combines outstanding technical capabilities with classic design. The model is equipped with a new 100-megapixel CMOS BSI sensor, new autofocus with phase detection, new 5-axis image stabilization with compensation up to 7 steps and a built-in 1TB SSD + CFexpress Type B memory slot.

fields.name: Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM
fields.description:
The Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM lens is a fast autofocus portrait lens for E-mount mirrorless cameras.

The lens features a bright f/1.4 maximum aperture that allows it to be used even in low light and provides better control over depth of field when working with selective focus techniques.

The optical scheme of the Sony FE 85mm f/1.4 GM includes one HA and 3 ED elements that help limit chromatic aberration and minimize artificial colouration.

The dual linear AF motor provides smooth, precise and near-silent focusing that benefits both stills and video applications.

fields.name: Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM
fields.description:
The Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM lens is a hybrid wide-angle prime model that includes a ring for manual iris control when shooting video. It is intended for mirrorless cameras with full-frame sensors and an RF mount.

The wide f/1.8 maximum aperture allows for low-light work, and the eleven diaphragm blades provide soft, cinematic bokeh.

The innovative VCM motor in combination with Nano USM guarantee extremely fast, precise and quiet autofocus.

The optical scheme includes two UD and two aspherical elements that minimize various aberrations, and the Air Sphere Coating (ASC) reduces halos and glare for maximum clarity, sharpness and contrast images.

The body is resistant to dust and moisture, and the fluorine coating on the front lens repels dirt and makes it easier to clean.

Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM also offers:

- Minimized "breathing" when focusing
- Rear holder for gel filters
- Customizable control ring and control button, etc.

fields.name: Canon RF 50mm f / 1.8 STM
fields.description:
The Canon RF 50mm f / 1.8 STM is a compact lens with a classic fixed focal length, which at the same time has a large maximum aperture for excellent depth of field control and for operation in low light conditions.

The optical scheme of the lens includes an aspherical element that corrects spherical aberrations, and the Super Spectra coating minimizes unwanted glare and improves colour reproduction and contrast.

Canon RF 50mm f / 1.8 STM is equipped with an STM motor for quiet and smooth autofocus and a control ring for selecting parameters such as ISO, exposure compensation and aperture.

fields.name: Nikkor Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S
fields.description:
Nikon NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f / 2.8 S is a bright universal lens that covers from wide-angle to portrait field of view. The lens is characterized by its constant maximum aperture of f / 2.8, which makes it a suitable choice for work in different lighting conditions, and also contributes to better control over the depth of field when working with selective focus.

The optical lens design includes a pair of Extra Low Dispersion elements and 4 aspherical elements, which help control chromatic and spherical aberrations throughout the magnification range, as well as improve the clarity and sharpness of images. ARNEO, Nano Crystal and Super Integrated Coating coatings also help to reduce glare and achieve higher contrast and accurate colour reproduction.

In addition to the optical design, the NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f / 2.8 S has two stepper motors that help achieve extremely fast, accurate and quiet autofocus, and the lens also has a ring with programmable settings for the camera and exposure and OLED an information panel that can be used to quickly confirm aperture and focus settings, and the L.Fn button allows you to make exposure adjustments and settings through the lens.

Nikon NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f / 2.8 S is dust and moisture-resistant, which allows its use in bad weather conditions.

fields.name: Nikkor Z 24-50mm f/4-6.3
fields.description:
The Nikon Nikkor Z 24-50mm f / 4-6.3 is an extremely short and light zoom lens for Nikon Z full-frame cameras, and its body is designed to be retractable when not in use.

It covers a universal wide-angle to standard focal length range and allows focusing of just 35 cm.

Nikkor Z 24-50mm f / 4-6.3 is also suitable for video recording, as focusing is quiet and focus breathing defect is minimized.

The model also offers a control ring, through which you can change basic settings - ISO, exposure compensation and more.

fields.name: Sony FE 70-200mm f / 2.8 GM OSS II
fields.description:
Sony FE 70-200mm F2.8 GM OSS II has a bright telephoto zoom lens with a new generation of AF, which achieves nearly 4 times higher speed and up to 30% better tracking focus compared to its predecessor.

The body and weight improvements are also significant and the FE 70-200mm F2.8 GM OSS II is approximately 29% lighter than the previous model with a weight of 1045 g, which makes it the world's lightest 200mm bright tele vario lens at the moment.

FE 70-200mm F2.8 GM OSS II provides exceptional image quality with high resolution and sharpness in every part of the frame, regardless of the degree of zoom, even at maximum aperture. Thanks to the two aspherical lens elements, including one XA (highly aspherical) element, precisely manufactured to an accuracy of 0.01 microns, the FE 70-20mm F2.8 GM OSS II effectively limits long-range aberrations to ensure exceptional resolution in each part of the image.

The FE 70-200mm F2.8 GM OSS II also uses two spherical ED (extremely low dispersion) elements and two Super ED spherical elements, which significantly reduce chromatic aberrations without mixing colours in the shadows. For the first time among all lenses in the Alpha system, this lens also uses an ED aspherical element that suppresses both chromatic and spherical aberrations, which are a common problem with other telephoto lenses.

fields.name: Battery Canon LP-E10
fields.description:
Compact Lithium-Ion battery with 860mAh capacity.

Compatible with Canon EOS 1100D, EOS 1200D, EOS 1300D, EOS 2000D, EOS 4000D.

fields.name: Battery Nikon EN-EL25 Lithium-Ion
fields.description:
Nikon EN-EL25 rechargeable lithium-ion battery with specifications: 7.6V, 1120mAh, 8.5 Wh
For the Nikon Z50 mirrorless camera
Compatible with Nikon MH-32 charger

fields.name: Battery Sony NP-FM500H
fields.description: Lithium-ion battery for Sony A900 Capacity 1650 mAh High-performance, compact and lightweight Stamina technology for long battery life

fields.name: Filter Nikon 67mm C-PL II
fields.description:
- Significantly reduces reflections from water and glass, as well as making blue skies darker
- It enhances the impression of a blue sky
- Allows shooting through glass windows and minimizes glare from reflective surfaces such as water and glass
- Suitable for colour and monochrome photography

fields.name: Filter Sony VF-72MPAM MC Protector
fields.description:
- Filter to protect the lens
- Multi-layer coating
- Super thin
- Diameter: 72 mm

fields.name: Filter Lee Filters Landscape Circular Polarizer - 105mm
fields.description: Highly efficient polarization filter with circular polarization of light suitable for TTL cameras. This filter reduces light reflections on smooth surfaces, cleans and saturates the colours in the frame by removing the blue shades caused by the light coming from bright blue skies, removes the characteristic blur of distant pictures, improves the detail in the shadows of the picture and in the clouds even in very bright skies, and enhances the contrast of the black and white frames
